isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CATERPILLAR - 1992 - 1993 - CHAPTER II

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: This section covers International installed components and circuits that directly interact with both:

item.para: The Caterpillar PEEC III Electronic Engine Control System available with 3406C engines.
The Caterpillar 3176 engine Electronic Engine Control System.

svcproc.para: There are significant differences in the two engine families, but few differences in the International installed circuits. This section:

item.para: Provides operation descriptions of International installed components and related circuits that work with the Caterpillar Electronic Engine Controls.
Provides circuit diagrams and connector composites for International electrical circuits.

svcproc.para: This section does not provide engine diagnostics, but does provide step-by-step troubleshooting guides for International installed components and circuits. These guides should be used when the Caterpillar PEEC III or 3176 Engine Diagnostics indicate a problem may be present in a International circuit or component.
Additional References are Mobile Training Manuals:

Only systems that include International installed components and/or circuits are discussed in this section.
Refer to the appropriate Caterpillar Service Literature for additional information.
